resources.string:
The customer shall be solely and fully liable for sharing Al Ahly Net/NBE Mobile user ID and passcode with any third party without any liability on the Bank. The customer shall make sure that the mobile phone number and e-mail registered with the Bank are correctly entered.
In case of adding more than one user on the Soft Token, the PIN will be the same for generating an OTP for all users.
The one-time password (OTP) shall be used for different electronic operations/ transactions available on Al Ahly Net/NBE Mobile including transfers, Fawry services, mutual fund certificate purchases, edit customer information, add/edit payee or any other operation/transaction that might be introduced or released subsequently in order to secure the electronic operations/transactions. NBE has the right to send an OTP to the mobile phone number linked to the account or to the e-mail, or by any other means.
Make sure that the OTP is not disclosed to any third party including NBE staff. The customer shall be fully responsible for any loss arising out of disclosing information without any liability on the part of the Bank.
After ticking for acceptance "Terms and Conditions", the customer shall be deemed fully responsible for any operations/ transactions carried out on Al Ahly Net/NBE Mobile using OTP, and the customer may not object to any operation/ transaction carried out using the service.
In case of activating the Soft Token App, the Hard Token will not be deactivated for existing retail customers. If a new customer wishes to activate the Hard Token as well, the customer shall visit the nearest NBE branch to request a new Hard Token.
In case of requesting a new Hard Token, the banking tariffs shall apply.
I accept the Terms and Conditions.

An OTP can be sent after

Login to Al Ahly Net/NBE Mobile and follow the below steps to get the QR code:

- Click on the side menu 
- Click on Token Services, then Soft Token Services, then Soft Token Activation. 
- OTP will be sent to the registered mobile number (Please do not share it with anyone). 
- Please accept the terms and conditions and click on Submit.
Scan QR code for Soft Token activation

The following are some of the frequently asked questions about NBE Soft Token
Is this service available to both retail and corporate customers?
No, it is available only to NBE’s retail customers.
Can I activate the Soft Token App on a mobile phone with a number other than the one registered with the bank?
No, you must ensure that the SIM card of the mobile number registered with the bank is on the same phone used to activate the Soft Token.
Can the Soft Token and Hard Token be used together in creating an OTP?
Yes, the Soft Token and Hard Token with a retail customer User ID can be used together in case you have subscribed to both types of tokens.

NBE\'s Soft Token is a mobile application that enables you to carry out your banking transactions online and via mobile banking through an effective and secure authentication process. The Soft Token generates a one-time password (OTP) for each financial/non-financial transaction online or via mobile banking. You can install the Soft Token App through Google Play/App Store.Please contact us on 19623 for further information or inquiries.
Activate your Soft Token by entering your activation details.
